languages.text: "Молчать!" {n}От рыка Абеляра, кажется, трясутся величественные стекла мостика.{/n} "Стража, схватить смутьяна!"
"Silence!" {n}The bridge's magnificent glass panes seem to tremble under the force of Abelard's roar.{/n} "Enforcers, seize this mutineer!"
languages.original_text: "Молчать!" {n}От рыка Абеляра, кажется, трясутся величественные стекла мостика.{/n} "Стража, схватить смутьяна!"

traits.locale_text: "Silence!" {n}The bridge's magnificent glass panes seem to tremble under the force of Abelard's roar.{/n} "Enforcers, seize this mutineer!"
"Silence!" {n}The bridge's magnificent glass panes seem to tremble under the force of Abelard's roar.{/n} "Enforcers, seize this mutineer!"
"Silence!" {n}The bridge's magnificent glass panes seem to tremble under the force of Abelard's roar.{/n} "Enforcers, seize this mutineer!"
"Silence!" {n}The bridge's magnificent glass panes seem to tremble under the force of Abelard's roar.{/n} "Enforcers, seize this mutineer!"

languages.text: “闭嘴！”{n}阿贝拉德怒吼起来，连舰桥上巨大的玻璃窗都颤了起来。{/n}“执法者，拿下这个叛徒！”
languages.original_text: "Silence!" {n}The bridge's magnificent glass panes seem to tremble under the force of Abelard's roar.{/n} "Enforcers, seize this mutineer!"

traits.locale_text: “闭嘴！”{n}阿贝拉德怒吼起来，连舰桥上巨大的玻璃窗都颤了起来。{/n}“镇压者，拿下这个叛徒！”

languages.text: 「静かに！」{n} アベラールの咆哮に、ブリッジの壮麗なガラス窓が震える。{/n}「エンフォーサー、この反乱者を捕まえろ！」
languages.original_text: "Silence!" {n}The bridge's magnificent glass panes seem to tremble under the force of Abelard's roar.{/n} "Enforcers, seize this mutineer!"

traits.locale_text: 「静かに！」{n} アベラールの咆哮に、ブリッジの壮麗なガラス窓が震える。{/n}「エンフォーサー、この反乱者を捕まえろ！」

languages.text: "Ruhe!" {n}Die gewaltigen Glasplatten der Brücke scheinen unter Abelards lautstarkem Ausruf zu erzittern.{/n} "Enforcers, ergreift diesen Meuterer!"
languages.original_text: "Silence!" {n}The bridge's magnificent glass panes seem to tremble under the force of Abelard's roar.{/n} "Enforcers, seize this mutineer!"

traits.locale_text: "Ruhe!" {n}Die gewaltigen Glasplatten der Brücke scheinen unter Abelards lautstarkem Ausruf zu erzittern.{/n} "Enforcers, ergreift diesen Meuterer!"

languages.text: « Silence ! » {n}Les magnifiques vitraux de la passerelle paraissent trembler sous la puissance du rugissement d'Abélard.{/n} « Prévôts, saisissez ce mutin ! »
languages.original_text: "Silence!" {n}The bridge's magnificent glass panes seem to tremble under the force of Abelard's roar.{/n} "Enforcers, seize this mutineer!"

traits.locale_text: « Silence ! » {n}Les magnifiques vitraux de la passerelle paraissent trembler sous la puissance du rugissement d'Abélard.{/n} « Prévôts, saisissez ce mutin ! »

languages.text: «¡Silencio!». {n}Los magníficos cristales del puente parecen temblar ante el poderoso rugido de Abelard.{/n} «¡Soldados, arresten a este amotinado!».
languages.original_text: "Silence!" {n}The bridge's magnificent glass panes seem to tremble under the force of Abelard's roar.{/n} "Enforcers, seize this mutineer!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Silencio!». {n}Los magníficos cristales del puente parecen temblar ante el poderoso rugido de Abelard.{/n} «¡Soldados, arresten a este amotinado!».

languages.text: "Kes sesini!" {n}Köprünün muhteşem cam panelleri, Abelard'ın kükremesinin etkisiyle titriyor sanki.{/n} "İnfazcılar, derdest edin şu asiyi!"
languages.original_text: "Silence!" {n}The bridge's magnificent glass panes seem to tremble under the force of Abelard's roar.{/n} "Enforcers, seize this mutineer!"
